summary: The bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." It instructs users to respect robots.txt rules when scraping content. It also informs users that their IP addresses may be rate-limited and directs them to use the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service (https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) for bulk data access. This bill's core concern is with proper access and usage of government data online.
